How should be the session-data stored? Advantage of DB is that you can split the Frontendserver from the db-server. fs or ipc is faster.
Framework Session

Kernel::System::AuthSession::IPC

No

Should the session management use html cookies? It's more comfortable to send links -==> if you have a valid session, you don't have to login again.) Note: If the client browser disabled html cookies, the system will work as usual, append SessionID to links! Sessionmanagement mit Cookies? Framework Session
No
Yes
store cookies in browser after closing a browser Cookies nach dem schließen des Browsers nicht löschen? Framework Session
No
Yes
